desc: Makers of a unique and innovative range of versatile portable drinks tables available in natural wood, or a choice of colours. Perfect for a gathering of family and friends, or just a quiet night in. Ideal for a barbecue in the garden, a picnic in the park, or when camping - these tables will add a touch of style.

layout.text: Makers of a unique and innovative range of versatile portable drinks tables available in natural wood, or a choice of colours
